<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Camera Control

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Checks whether given post process effect is enabled

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> [[ppEffectEnabled]] effect

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> effect: [[Number]] - effect handle

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name> s2</name>=<value> [[ppEffectEnabled]] effect <template><title>Since</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>2.03.147162</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>y</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_enabled = [[ppEffectEnabled]] _hndl;</code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_enabled = [[ppEffectEnabled]] "DynamicBlur";</code>
